Text:
Signalboy just wanted to say thanks for your contributions for the MANY of us who only download Holyroses's top notch encodes. It's great to have even more options available to HR's already stellar movie catalog. Keep up the great work!

If your looking for some requests/ideas for future releases that us holyroses encode followers would salivate at the chance at having in ipod/psp/zune format here are a few:

Heat (1995), Goodfellas (1990), Casino (1995), The Godfather 1 (1972), The Godfather 2 (1974), Scarface (1983), Snatch (2000), Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels (1998),  The Boondock Saints (1999), Reservoir Dogs (2002), Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas (1998), Blow (2001)

I know quite a list but again just mearly suggestions if your looking for any if your not simply disregard.

Thanks again signalboy and TEAM holyroses!

Hey no problem! Just wanted to take a second and let you know your hard work and uploads using HR's encodes have not gone unnoticed and are GREATLY appreciated.

Again, Since King Roses has all the new releases covered its nice to have more options for "older" movies that people need to check out in the BEST ipod/psp/zune encoding format available.

thanx buddy for the movie
